Acure Oil Matifying Facial Moisturizer (2020 formulation)

Brand: Acure

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: WATER, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE*, GLYCERYL STEARATE CITRATE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, GLYCERYL CAPRYLATE, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) OIL, CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) OIL, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, THEOBROMA CACAO (COCOA) SEED BUTTER, COCOGLYCERIDES, GLYCERIN, SODIUM LEVULINATE, POTASSIUM SORBATE, GLYCERYL LAURATE, TOCOPHEROL, OLEA

OIL, CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) OIL, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, THEOBROMA CACAO (COCOA) SEED BUTTER, COCOGLYCERIDES, GLYCERIN, SODIUM LEVULINATE, POTASSIUM SORBATE, GLYCERYL LAURATE, TOCOPHEROL, OLEA EUROPAEA (OLIVE) FRUIT OIL, CALENDULA OFFICINALIS FLOWER EXTRACT, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE (VITAMIN E), OENOTHERA BIENNIS (EVENING PRIMROSE) OIL, UBIQUINONE

SORBATE, GLYCERYL LAURATE, TOCOPHEROL, OLEA EUROPAEA (OLIVE) FRUIT OIL, CALENDULA OFFICINALIS FLOWER EXTRACT, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE (VITAMIN E), OENOTHERA BIENNIS (EVENING PRIMROSE) OIL, UBIQUINONE (COQ10), ARGANIA SPINOSA (ARGAN) OIL*, SYRINGA VULGARIS MERISTEM CULTURE (LILAC), MARRUBIUM VULGARE MERISTEM CELL CULTURE, ECHINACEA AGUSTIFOLIA MERISTEM

BIENNIS (EVENING PRIMROSE) OIL, UBIQUINONE (COQ10), ARGANIA SPINOSA (ARGAN) OIL*, SYRINGA VULGARIS MERISTEM CULTURE (LILAC), MARRUBIUM VULGARE MERISTEM CELL CULTURE, ECHINACEA AGUSTIFOLIA MERISTEM CELL CULTURE, CHLORELLA PYRENOIDOSA EXTRACT, EUTERPE OLERACEA FRUIT (ACAI) EXTRACT*, RUBUS FRUTICOSUS (BLACKBERRY) EXTRACT*, PUNICA GRANATUM

MERISTEM CELL CULTURE, ECHINACEA AGUSTIFOLIA MERISTEM CELL CULTURE, CHLORELLA PYRENOIDOSA EXTRACT, EUTERPE OLERACEA FRUIT (ACAI) EXTRACT*, RUBUS FRUTICOSUS (BLACKBERRY) EXTRACT*, PUNICA GRANATUM (POMEGRANATE) EXTRACT*, ROSA CANINA FRUIT (ROSEHIP) EXTRACT*, CALENDULA OFFICINALIS FLOWER EXTRACT*, CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA (MATRICARIA) FLOWER EXTRACT*,

(BLACKBERRY) EXTRACT*, PUNICA GRANATUM (POMEGRANATE) EXTRACT*, ROSA CANINA FRUIT (ROSEHIP) EXTRACT*, CALENDULA OFFICINALIS FLOWER EXTRACT*, CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA (MATRICARIA) FLOWER EXTRACT*, ASPALATHUS LINEARIS LEAF (ROOIBOS) EXTRACT*.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity; LOW: Cancer
